title: Inquire About a Tax Refund Status
description: A citizen who filed their income taxes wants to check the status of their refund.

tasks.description: Identify the citizen using their SSN, filing status, and exact refund amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely identifies the citizen's tax return.

tasks.description: Check the status of the tax refund in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the refund was approved and is scheduled for direct deposit next week.

tasks.description: Provide the status update, including the scheduled payment date, to the citizen.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the refund status and date.
